about_the_game:
Evelyn inherited the small cocktail bar‘Hyacinth Bar' in her hometown according to her grandfather’s will. However, she is not easy to running a store, becuse she knows nothing about cocktail bars.

At that time, five men appeared in front of her!

With their help, evelyn becomes increasingly interested in alcohol, studies cocktails, and becomes skilled at running a bar. But these guys seem to be crossing a line too far when it comes to helping develop cocktail menus.

Developing new menus, increasing sales, an unexpected love line, a turbulent story unfolds before Evelyn.

---------

'Liquor Love Lady' is a visual novel-based game with minigame.

A game where the goal is to run a store, develop a new menu, and compete in a cocktail contest with the man with the most affinity.

You can enjoy the fun of the tycoon game through a mini game where you open a bar, make and sell cocktails.

The money earned from running a bar, you can purchase character event scenarios to increase he's favorability or develop new cocktail menus. Or you can upgrade your store to earn more money.

Ultimately, you can participate in a cocktail contest with most favorability character.
